name: Renee Eastman
text: The buffet is okay for lunch.  They have a variety of pizza,  a pasta, bread sticks and the salad bar,  plus a dessert pizza or dessert bread sticks. Staff is friendly.  Quick and easy

name: Harvey Weiss Jr.
text: Service is likely a highlight to this pizzeria/restaurant. Food is average at best, contains a salad bar, and pricing is ok. You are likely better off going to a competitor.

name: Brenda Crane
text: The food was good. It was so cold in there. My husband and I start eating and I can hear one of the works talk. What she started to say shocked and surprised me she was talking about not wearing her gloves when was touching the food. How …More

name: Joshua Manella
text: They pooped on my pizza and said give a big tip or ill destroy my restaurant and blame this all on you. So if you are a smart person i would not consider going to pizza hut.

name: Francine Selleck
text: We were ordering a medium size pan pizza with a trip to the salad bar. Waitress tells us that they have a special of 2 medium pizzas for $6.99 each- specialty pizzas, as many toppings as you want, only $6.99. We questioned & verified. …More

name: Justin LaBarre
text: This restaurant was very hot when I went in on 8/24 and the air conditioning didn't work. They couldn't open the restaurant doors because of files that could come in (there were already some files inside). Pizza was alright, got too cold too quick and was very rubbery. Unless the air conditioning is fixed, I am not coming back.

name: Carrie Ward
text: Great place to take the kids for lunch while on school break

name: Deb Crandall
text: Love the food here, sometimes there isn't the type of pizza I like on their lunch buffet though

name: Diego Gutierrez
text: I been ordering there almost every week never had a issue wings are great workers there r nice people

name: Dylan Frank
text: Terrible! They couldn't even pick up the phone after trying numerous times. After I got through the person hung up on me.

name: Don Jones
text: Good food and service!

text: This Pizza Hutt is much better than the Rome Pizza Hutt.  Lunch buffet was awesome.
